cards.content: This tool allows you to visually see how parent/child/ancestor components are affected by a change in a any component. It is a great tool to understand how Angular change detection works.
No header, but there is a content field provided. This is just really long text to try and fill out more of the card to see how it handles itself.
This tool allows you to visually see how parent/child/ancestor components are affected by a change in a any component. It is a great tool to understand how Angular change detection works.
